name: Sea To Summit Thermolite Reactor Sleeping Bag Liner
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Increase the temperature rating of your sleeping bag on particularly cold nights. This soft and stretchy mummy-bag liner adds up to 8C of warmth, allowing you to sleep comfortably without needing to change sleeping bags.Made of hollow-core Thermolite® polyester knit fabric.Cinchable drawcord hood.Includes a silnylon stuff sack.
